subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Biathlon
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn become the first American downhill skier to earn a World Cup victory on three straight days and the first woman to do so since 1997.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn become the first American downhill skier to earn a World Cup victory on three straight days and the first woman to do so since 1997.
